ModMetaData.name: VPE - RimCuisine 2 Core
ModMetaData.author: Oreno
ModMetaData.description:
Vanilla Plants Expanded already works alongside RimCuisine 2 Core but only with renamed items. This patch restores renamed items and make it work together.
Changes - Changed back VPE items name and artwork. - Removed all duplicate items on the RimCuisine side. - VPE plants will require RimCuisine research. - VPE raw plants used RimCuisine taste thought. - Replaced VPE fruit category with RimCuisine version.
